body:
yes you can but with some limitations.

you need to write a cal file to describe how the data is collected.

plasdata/transdata are a good start.

G.





________________________________

[mailto:radiance-general-bounces@radiance-online.org] On Behalf Of
Alessandro Artus
Sent: 15 August 2007 10:44
To: radiance-general@radiance-online.org
Importance: High



Dear All,



Some one can tell me if it possible to render BRDF data measurement with
Radiance?



Thanks in advance.

Best Regards,

Alessandro.
